Cherrycake\Modules\CacheProviderMemcached::set

set

Stores a value in the Memcached cache.

    Signature

    public function set(string $key, mixed $value, [boolean $ttl = false] )

    Parameters

    $key — string
    The identifier key
    $value — mixed
    The value
    $ttl — boolean
    The TTL (Time To Live) of the stored value in seconds since now

    Returns

    bool
    Wether the value has been correctly stored. False otherwise

    CacheProviderInterface
